column4: Hm, I hope someone can help me. Im having troubles using a USB mouse on my ubuntu laptop. If I plug it in it doesn't work at all. If I restart with the mouse, it's just extremely laggy ... Anyone who know how to fix this?
unplug it and replug it - i have usb logitech mouse; also try a different usb port if you have more than 1
Tried that. And tried three different mouse
well, in my case, i used one port that works perfectly with usb mouse. other two doesn't work well. this is what i've experienced with usb mouse. sorry, cannot help more.
